mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.sheyingshi_id as sheyingshiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.sheyingshi_order_types as sheyingshiOrderTypes ,a.sheyingshi_order_start_time as sheyingshiOrderStartTime ,a.sheyingshi_order_end_time as sheyingshiOrderEndTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
